metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17476 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 4.0.x before 4.0.28, 5.0.x before 5.0.26, and 6.0.x before 6.0.3, when cookie support is disabled, might allow remote attackers to hijack web sessions and consequently gain privileges via a crafted email.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.3-1
otrs2 - 6.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.3-1').
